Translations.Text: autem prout regards those fall sin ignorance tunc repent deinde reform tuus Dominus hoc perfecit est Forgiver Merciful
Abraham est indeed exemplary vanguard his submission to DEUS monotheist qui nunquam worshipped idols
he est appreciative de His Dominus blessings He chose eum guided eum straight path
Nos granted eum happiness in hoc vita in Hereafter he est cum the righteous
Tunc nos inspired vos (Muhammad) subsequentis religionis Abraham monotheist; he nunquam est idol worshiper
Sabbath decretum unus those finis disputing it (Jews Christians)! Tuus Dominus est Unus scabinus them Feria Resurrection their disputes
Vos invite path tuus Dominus cum wisdom generis enlightenment ac debate them bonus possible moris! Tuus Dominus knows bene qui habet strayed His path He knows bene qui guided unus
Ac si vos punish vos inflict equivalent punishment. Vos resort to patience instead de revenge it est bene patient unus
Vos resort patience - Tuus patience est attainable unus deus help Non grieve them non annoyed their schemes
DEUS est those lead righteous VITA those est charitable
